description: This is a configuration file for Vite, used in a React frontend project. It sets up environment variable loading, plugins, path aliases, and server settings.

methods.name: defineConfig
methods.description: Configures Vite with project-specific settings, accepting a function that receives the mode and returns configuration options.

methods.name: loadEnv
methods.description: Loads environment variables based on the current mode and directory, filtering for variables with a specified prefix ('REACT_APP_').
